name: Winds Over the Ice Barrier
effectText: Tribute any number of "Ice Barrier" monsters; Special Summon from your Deck that many Level 4 or lower "Ice Barrier" monsters with different names from each other. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your "Ice Barrier" monsters that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Winds Over the Ice Barrier" once per turn.
